'''''Dip, Duck, Dive, Dodge, Defeat''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat an [[Rhodeia of Loch|Oceanid]] without being hit by water bombs left behind by certain [[Hydro Mimics]].
